title: ToDoWrite Models Schema
description: Schema for hierarchical task management with integer primary keys

Goal.table_description: Collection of goal instances stored as rows

labels.description: This goal has related label instances
labels.accessor: Use .labels to access related label records

tasks.description: This goal has related task instances
tasks.accessor: Use .tasks to access related task records

phases.description: This goal has related phase instances
phases.accessor: Use .phases to access related phase records

constraints.description: This goal has related constraints instances
constraints.accessor: Use .constraints to access related constraints records

concepts.description: This goal has related concept instances
concepts.accessor: Use .concepts to access related concept records

contexts.description: This goal has related context instances
contexts.accessor: Use .contexts to access related context records

Goal.model_purpose: Represents one goal with its specific attributes

labels.description: This concept has related label instances
labels.accessor: Use .labels to access related label records

goals.description: This concept has related goal instances
goals.accessor: Use .goals to access related goal records

contexts.description: This concept has related context instances
contexts.accessor: Use .contexts to access related context records

requirements.description: This concept has related requirements instances
requirements.accessor: Use .requirements to access related requirements records

Concept.model_purpose: Represents one concept with its specific attributes

labels.description: This context has related label instances
labels.accessor: Use .labels to access related label records

concepts.description: This context has related concept instances
concepts.accessor: Use .concepts to access related concept records

goals.description: This context has related goal instances
goals.accessor: Use .goals to access related goal records

requirements.description: This context has related requirements instances
requirements.accessor: Use .requirements to access related requirements records

Context.model_purpose: Represents one context with its specific attributes

labels.description: This constraints has related label instances
labels.accessor: Use .labels to access related label records

goals.description: This constraints has related goal instances
goals.accessor: Use .goals to access related goal records

requirements.description: This constraints has related requirements instances
requirements.accessor: Use .requirements to access related requirements records

Constraints.model_purpose: Represents one constraints with its specific attributes

labels.description: This requirements has related label instances
labels.accessor: Use .labels to access related label records

constraints.description: This requirements has related constraints instances
constraints.accessor: Use .constraints to access related constraints records

acceptance_criteria.description: This requirements has related acceptancecriteria instances
acceptance_criteria.accessor: Use .acceptance_criteria to access related acceptancecriteria records

concepts.description: This requirements has related concept instances
concepts.accessor: Use .concepts to access related concept records

contexts.description: This requirements has related context instances
contexts.accessor: Use .contexts to access related context records

Requirements.model_purpose: Represents one requirements with its specific attributes

labels.description: This acceptancecriteria has related label instances
labels.accessor: Use .labels to access related label records

requirements.description: This acceptancecriteria has related requirements instances
requirements.accessor: Use .requirements to access related requirements records

interface_contracts.description: This acceptancecriteria has related interfacecontract instances
interface_contracts.accessor: Use .interface_contracts to access related interfacecontract records

commands.description: This acceptancecriteria has related command instances
commands.accessor: Use .commands to access related command records

AcceptanceCriteria.model_purpose: Represents one acceptancecriteria with its specific attributes

labels.description: This interfacecontract has related label instances
labels.accessor: Use .labels to access related label records

acceptance_criteria.description: This interfacecontract has related acceptancecriteria instances
acceptance_criteria.accessor: Use .acceptance_criteria to access related acceptancecriteria records

phases.description: This interfacecontract has related phase instances
phases.accessor: Use .phases to access related phase records

InterfaceContract.model_purpose: Represents one interfacecontract with its specific attributes

labels.description: This phase has related label instances
labels.accessor: Use .labels to access related label records

goals.description: This phase has related goal instances
goals.accessor: Use .goals to access related goal records

steps.description: This phase has related step instances
steps.accessor: Use .steps to access related step records

interface_contracts.description: This phase has related interfacecontract instances
interface_contracts.accessor: Use .interface_contracts to access related interfacecontract records

Phase.model_purpose: Represents one phase with its specific attributes

labels.description: This step has related label instances
labels.accessor: Use .labels to access related label records

phases.description: This step has related phase instances
phases.accessor: Use .phases to access related phase records

tasks.description: This step has related task instances
tasks.accessor: Use .tasks to access related task records

Step.model_purpose: Represents one step with its specific attributes

labels.description: This task has related label instances
labels.accessor: Use .labels to access related label records

goals.description: This task has related goal instances

steps.description: This task has related step instances

SubTask.table_description: Collection of subtask instances stored as rows

labels.description: This subtask has related label instances
labels.accessor: Use .labels to access related label records

tasks.description: This subtask has related task instances
tasks.accessor: Use .tasks to access related task records

commands.description: This subtask has related command instances
commands.accessor: Use .commands to access related command records

SubTask.model_purpose: Represents one subtask with its specific attributes

Command.description: Executable command script for accomplishing specific SubTasks
Command.table_description: Collection of executable commands that define what script or command to run to accomplish SubTasks

acceptance_criteria.description: This command belongs to a specific acceptance criteria instance
acceptance_criteria.accessor: Use .acceptance_criteria to access the parent acceptance criteria record

labels.description: This command has related label instances
labels.accessor: Use .labels to access related label records

Command.model_purpose: Represents the ONLY executable layer in ToDoWrite - defines what script or command to run to accomplish specific SubTasks

Label.description: Strategic categorization label for classifying models by purpose and type
Label.table_description: Collection of strategic labels used to categorize and classify models (strategic, financial, design, technical, etc.)

goals.description: This label has related goal instances
goals.accessor: Use .goals to access related goal records

concepts.description: This label has related concept instances
concepts.accessor: Use .concepts to access related concept records

contexts.description: This label has related context instances
contexts.accessor: Use .contexts to access related context records

constraints.description: This label has related constraints instances
constraints.accessor: Use .constraints to access related constraints records

requirements.description: This label has related requirements instances
requirements.accessor: Use .requirements to access related requirements records

acceptance_criteria.description: This label has related acceptancecriteria instances
acceptance_criteria.accessor: Use .acceptance_criteria to access related acceptancecriteria records

interface_contracts.description: This label has related interfacecontract instances
interface_contracts.accessor: Use .interface_contracts to access related interfacecontract records

phases.description: This label has related phase instances
phases.accessor: Use .phases to access related phase records

steps.description: This label has related step instances
steps.accessor: Use .steps to access related step records

tasks.description: This label has related task instances
tasks.accessor: Use .tasks to access related task records

sub_tasks.description: This label has related subtask instances
sub_tasks.accessor: Use .sub_tasks to access related subtask records

commands.description: This label has related command instances
commands.accessor: Use .commands to access related command records

Label.model_purpose: Represents a strategic categorization label used to classify models by purpose (strategic, financial, design, technical, etc.)

goals_concepts.rails_associations: Goal has_and_belongs_to_many :concepts (through this table), Concept has_and_belongs_to_many :goals (through this table)
goals_concepts.purpose: Implements the many-to-many relationship between Goal and Concept models
goals_concepts.table_purpose: Stores the specific Goal-Concept pairs that are associated
goals_concepts.relationship_description: These specific Goals are connected to these specific Concepts

goals_contexts.rails_associations: Goal has_and_belongs_to_many :contexts (through this table), Context has_and_belongs_to_many :goals (through this table)
goals_contexts.purpose: Implements the many-to-many relationship between Goal and Context models
goals_contexts.table_purpose: Stores the specific Goal-Context pairs that define 'why are we defining this goal'
goals_contexts.relationship_description: These specific Goals are defined within these specific Contexts

concepts_contexts.rails_associations: Concept has_and_belongs_to_many :contexts (through this table), Context has_and_belongs_to_many :concepts (through this table)
concepts_contexts.purpose: Implements the many-to-many relationship between Concept and Context models
concepts_contexts.table_purpose: Stores the specific Concept-Context pairs that define 'what conceptually are we building'
concepts_contexts.relationship_description: These specific Concepts are viewed through these specific Contexts

requirements_concepts.rails_associations: Requirement has_and_belongs_to_many :concepts (through this table), Concept has_and_belongs_to_many :requirements (through this table)
requirements_concepts.purpose: Implements the many-to-many relationship between Requirements and Concept models
requirements_concepts.table_purpose: Stores the specific Requirement-Concept pairs that answer 'what conceptually do you mean?'
requirements_concepts.relationship_description: These specific Requirements are clarified by these specific Concepts

requirements_contexts.rails_associations: Requirement has_and_belongs_to_many :contexts (through this table), Context has_and_belongs_to_many :requirements (through this table)
requirements_contexts.purpose: Implements the many-to-many relationship between Requirements and Context models
requirements_contexts.table_purpose: Stores the specific Requirement-Context pairs that answer 'in what context does this requirement apply?'
requirements_contexts.relationship_description: These specific Requirements apply in these specific Contexts

constraints_requirements.rails_associations: Constraint has_and_belongs_to_many :requirements (through this table), Requirement has_and_belongs_to_many :constraints (through this table)
constraints_requirements.purpose: Implements the many-to-many relationship between Constraints and Requirements models
constraints_requirements.table_purpose: Stores the specific Constraint-Requirement pairs that define constraints
constraints_requirements.relationship_description: These specific Constraints constrain these specific Requirements
